title: Winter bale grazing set up & horses frolic into their new paddock

tasks.task: Setting up and managing electric fences for horses
subtasks: Observing horse behavior and ensuring their safe entry
Guiding horses through the gate into the fenced area
Monitoring horse movement and adjusting the grazing section
Considering the horses' lung health when introducing new grazing areas
Arranging hay bales in designated sections within the field
Allowing horses to graze the bales gradually as the grass diminishes
Providing additional seed for diversification of the grazed area

tasks.task: Interacting with farm animals (horses, lambs, and chickens)
subtasks: Checking on the well-being of individual animals (e.g., arthritic Alfie)
Directing animals to specific areas (e.g., letting lambs out, calling chickens)
Observing animal behavior and adjusting management strategies accordingly
